TopicTitle: Planets with new textures or bump maps?

Articles.Content:
I have only several days before I have to pack up and move out to a new town. So I figure I only have time for one more good mission. I would like to go to a planet that has been newly overhauled! But I can't find a list of which planets have been updated. Just looking in the map view zooming in and out it looks like the Mun, Eve, and maybe Duna have been updated. Am I missing any? I would really like a complete list before I set my sights on one. I have my preferences

Thanks!
That's right, it's Kerbin, Mun, Eve and Duna.
Not only that Moho and Laythe too!
